sectionOne.title: The Team behind Physiographie
sectionOne.paragraphOne: Since 2000, the Pathokinesiology Laboratory has been part of the Gingras-Lindsay Rehabilitation Institute of Montreal. Research activities are carried out in partnership with the Center for Interdisciplinary Research in Rehabilitation of Greater Montreal.
sectionOne.paragraphTwo: The researchers at the Pathokinesiology Laboratory are responsible for training graduate students (master's, doctorate, and post-doctorate) as well as supervising research assistants. Although the number of students fluctuates from year to year, the number of doctoral students continues to grow.
